summary: Normally the Nightingale powers you acquire from the questline are restricted to being cast once a day.  This mod changes the powers so they can be cast repeatedly without any sort of cooldown.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
	     LFox No Nightingale Power Cooldown v1.0
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

     2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.  It will
be incompatible with anything that modifies the Nightingale
powers.

*****************************************************************

     3. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

Normally the Nightingale powers you acquire from the questline
are restricted to being cast once a day.  This mod changes the
powers so they can be cast repeatedly without any sort of
cooldown.

NOTE: I actually planned to have about a 5 minute cooldown on
the powers but i couldn\'t figure out how to give them a
cooldown.  What i changed was actually a tag on the spell not
any sort of cooldown duration.

*****************************************************************

     4. Version History

*****************************************************************

v1.0
- Made the plugin

*****************************************************************

     5. Contact Info

*****************************************************************

Direct all questions/comments to
hornedreapermjl@hotmail.com
author: LFox
